sect2.title: System.IsUpper
sect2.para: If AIndex is specified, IsUpper returns true if the character AString[AIndex] is an upper case letter, otherwise IsUpper returns false.

If AIndex is not specified, IsUpper returns true if every character of AString is an upper case letter, otherwise IsUpper returns false. If there are no case relative characters, or no characters at all in the string, IsUpper returns true.
Dataphor uses zero based indexing.
